title: unnaiyE nambi
sahitya:
unnaiyE nambi nAn uidu viTTEnayyA cenni malai vAsanE ennidaya nEsanE


anupallavi

  annai pOl anbuDan ennai nI Adarikka inru pOl enrumE inbuTrirukkavE


caraNam    vanna mayil vAhanattE vaLLi deivAnaiyoDu punnakaip-polivinil pongi varum kanivODu
kaN kaNDa deivamAi kATSi tarum unnai kaNDavarukkuNDO kavalai tarum tollai
